name: Word Connect- Brain Search
description:
With over 1000 interesting levels to be explored, you can challenge your brain limit DAILY! Become clever as you discover tens of thousands of new words - all handpicked - with fun definitions guaranteed to train your vocabulary and enhance spelling skill while you have fun playing this game!

- Simple, fun & addictive gameplay
- 1000+ levels with tons of words await you
- Discover hidden words from mixed letters
- Starts easy and get challenging fast
- Play for free in anytime and anywhere
- No wifi? Don’t worry, play with friends offline
- Login every day to get free Daily Bonus coins
- Develop your mind and vocabulary
